utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! You look nice. What's the occasion?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Monica and I are celebrating our ten-month anniversary, we've got reservations at Ja George.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! How'd you get in there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Made a few calls, pulled some strings, and they agreed to seat us at 11:30 if we both had the chicken and didn't get desert.

utterance.speaker: Delivery Girl
utterance.content: Hi Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Caitlin! Somebody got a haircut.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Ugh, I hate it! I look like an 8-year-old boy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, if that was true, gym class would've been a lot more interesting.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: It's uh, 27 dollars even.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, okay. Here you go.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Hey, where's the chicken?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, he's in the back. The duck pissed him off, said that eggs came first.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Great. I'll see you later!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What the hell was that?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The flirting! Aren't you supposed to be going out with, I don't know hmm, let's say my sister?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was not flirting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was totally flirting. "Somebody got a haircut "

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay first of all, the impression, uncanny. And second, that was not flirting, that was just casual conversation between two people. That is all.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You wanna see flirting? I'll show you flirting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am so proud of Joey, I can't believe he's going to be on Law Order!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know. But don't you think that it should be called Order and Law?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No because first they arrest the guy and then they try him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don't get me started on that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was not flirting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And on your anniversary, for shame!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler was hitting on the hot delivery girl!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was not and oh God, shh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I'm sorry but you were! Okay? And besides if anyone should be hitting on her it's the guy who's single, the guy that who-who-who can do something about it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sounds like somebody wants to be Mr. Pizza Delivery Girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that what this is about? You like Caitlin?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! We broke up two years ago; you've been married since then. I think it's okay that we see other people.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I-I was watching her the other day at the pizza place.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hm-mmm.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And she's just so sexy and funny and has the cutest little…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what? We don't need her measurements.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay pepperoni, pepperoni, pepperoni, okay Ross, I know she's pretty and you love her, but is she stupid?! She forgot my vegetarian!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This is perfect! She'll have to come back here with your pizza, and when she does, I'll turn on the Charm-O-Ross. Oh I'm so glad you don't eat meat.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: See? Vegetarianism benefits everyone.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey everybody, look who's here! You remember my grandmother!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Big night!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is so cool!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, Joey on Law Order, you must be very proud!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler, she doesn't understand a word of English.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sorry, I thought you were Joey's other grandmother. I've done it again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She's my biggest fan. Yeah, she's the only one in the family that's believed in me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I uh weighted like 27 pounds when I was born so…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Happy Anniversary!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Happy Anniversary, 10 months!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So umm, when I was in the shower I was thinking about our first night in London…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uhh, Joey's grandmother is right there.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is that the one that speaks English or the one that doesn't?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The one that doesn't.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That was some hot love you gave me! I'm gonna go get ready.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, why don't you wear those earrings I gave you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's a great idea! I was saving them for something special.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You have got to go home!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But I like it here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You gotta go home and get the earrings that you borrowed from me okay? Chandler wants me to wear them tonight.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, well I think that they're in my purse. Why don't you go get dressed and I'll look for them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! Rach, hi, I need those earrings you borrowed.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, umm, okay, yeah, I'll be, yeah I'll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow Pheebs, you speak Italian?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I guess so.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Here you go. Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait, Rach! Where's the other one?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh what, you-you want both of them?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel Karen Green, where's the other earring?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, okay, okay, look, just don't freak out, but I kinda lost it. I know it's in the apartment, but I definitely lost it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, what am I going to tell Monica? She wants to wear them tonight!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Tell her to wear her own earrings.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: These are her earrings.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nooo! Nooooo! You lent me Monica's earrings?! I'm not allowed to borrow her stuff!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because I lose her stuff!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, see that blind guy right there? I'm gonna bash his head in later.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh umm, my big scene is coming up. Big scene coming up.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If you said, "Big lima bean, bubbling up." Would she understand the difference?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach? What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh boy, I just can't watch. It's too scary!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's a diaper commercial.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yeah well, you know me, babies, responsibilities, ahhh!!!

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Pizza delivery!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll get it! I will get that!

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: One uh, vegetarian pizza. That's $12.15.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh. Uh, by the way, if it makes you feel any better. I happen to like 8-year-old boys.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The uh, your hair, before, your hair, you said you thought your looks like an 8-year-old's, and I'm just saying I like it. The hair.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Oh. Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You understand I don't actually like 8-year-old boys.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Y'know, all I'm looking for is the money.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here you go. Now stop bringing us pizzas you.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: I'm gonna try.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You're welcome.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You couldn't let me have her, could ya?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This is a girl that I really like and had too swoop in there!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's goin' on?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler was totally flirting with the hot delivery girl!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you for that! I was not flirting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's okay. I don't care. It's uh, it's fine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's no big deal, I do it all the time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So umm, you-you flirt with guys all the time?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sure! It doesn't mean anything! Just like I know it doesn't mean anything with you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but there is a big difference. You are a lot hotter than I am.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: True story!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, this actually bothers you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, it does bother me! And I think it would bother a lot of people. Rachel, when you were going out with Ross, did it bother you when he flirted with other women?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uhh, no, no, it bothered me when he slept with other women.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And thank you, for that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But y'know, I never really had anything to worry about. Ross was never very good at the flirting thing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What-what, what are talking about? It-it worked with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Y'know what? You're right! We meet, you flirted and then bamn nine years later you had me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, all right. You-you-you know what I'm going to do? I am going to order another pizza and when Caitlin gets here, you-you--I will show how well I flirt. Yeah! I will, I will get her phone number! And not the one on the menu!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I found it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh! Thank God! Where was it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: On your dresser.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay that is the one we already have!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, everybody just keep smiling. It'll kill my grandmother if she finds out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, what is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, they cut me out of the show.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Maybe your scene's coming up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Not likely. 'Cause you see that body bag right there

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm in it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: This is terrible, what are you going to do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know. This little, old lady lives for my career. When they dumped me off of Days of Our Lives she almost died.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's not good.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, smile! Not that face, smile! Everybody smile!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, why don't you just tell her what happened? It's not your fault.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If we keep talking this way, aren't we gonna freak her out soon?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Soon, soon, I'm gonna be on soon. There I am!

utterance.speaker: Grandma Tribbiani
utterance.content: No! Sam Waterston!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no, that-that's me, that's me.

utterance.speaker: Grandma Tribbiani
utterance.content: No, it's Sam Waterston! Crimes and Misdemeanors, Capricorn One.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Doesn't know, "Hello." But she knows Capricorn One.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe! I have to have those earrings, we're going to leave as soon as the show is over.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But I already gave them back to you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No you didn't.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I already didn't give them back to you, that's what I said. Where is that other earring?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It's not here Pheebs, it's not here. Ohh, I went to Joey and Chandler's last night! Okay!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Make sure you check Chandler's jewelry box.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait a minute. Chandler has a jewelry box?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, we have like ten minutes. Do you want me to get into that now?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs! How's that uh, vegetarian pizza working out for ya? You and those vegetables have a real thing going on, huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why are you being weird?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you like it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, that would be, "Why are you being cute?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, I'm working on my flirting.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! I did not get that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So uh Monica, do you, do you like the Law Order?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, it's good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See, I'm finding out all this stuff about you today, like you like the Law Order and that you flirted with every guy in the Tri-State area!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler! Okay, let me get this straight, it's okay for you to flirt, but not for me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I'm so glad we cleared that up. Look, I'm sorry, some things are different for men and for women.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Go on, teach me something about men and women.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I've already taught you so much already, but whatever. See when you flirt with a guy you think, "I'm just flirting, no big deal." But the guy is thinking, "Finally! Somebody who wants to sleep with me!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No way!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's true.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well that's pathetic!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Again true.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And this goes for all guys?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All guys that are awake. Then we go to sleep and then all the guys from the other end of the world wake up and behave the exact same way.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, it's another commercial; I still haven't told her!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey! This is like the last commercial. You've got like ten minutes left!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know, I know! What am I going to do? Ooh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! You are not gonna run out and leave her here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, all right. Ooh!

utterance.speaker: Grandma Tribbiani
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, Joey is gonna be right back. Right back! Meanwhile, let's-let's-let's talk about you. So, you're old and small.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Did you find it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: The earring? No. But look, I found my sunglasses under the couch! I've been looking for these since like last summer.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, those are my sunglasses, you borrowed them from me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, calm down, here they are.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are we going to do?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't know, I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right well, we're just gonna have to tell Monica, that's all.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh gosh, she's going to kill me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I suppose I could tell her it's just all my fault.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh that'd be great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Mon, can I talk to you for a sec?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, what is it?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, I lost one of your earrings. I'm sorry! I am so, so sorry!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! All right well, I mean, what can you do? If you lost it you lost it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I will replace it, I promise. I feel so terrible.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, sweetie that's fine. You didn't do it on purpose.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Look at you! Come here! Feel better?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! You're the best!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, wait a minute. Wait a minute, I-I-I, I can't do this. Listen honey, this is, it's not Phoebe's fault. She lent me the earrings, and I lost it. I'm so sorry. Honey, I feel terrible too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That is exactly why I do not lend you stuff!! Okay?! I mean, first it's my jewelry! And if it's not my jewelry, it's-it's my blue sweater! And if it's not my sweater, it's my sunglasses!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Your sunglasses?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, right!

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Pizza!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, mine! Mine! Mine! Okay, here goes. Prepare yourselves for some Class A flirting.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, hold on. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Honey, you have nothing to prove. And if you really like this girl, I don't flirting is the right thing to…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You'll see. Okay. Oh, what's-what's her name?

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Caitlin!

utterance.speaker: Grandma Tribbiani
utterance.content: Caitlin!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Oh, we-we can't keep eating like this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, so, do you make the pizzas in one of those uh, wood-burning ovens?

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: No actually umm, I think that they're umm, gas.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Gas? Wow! Intense.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If this is the way all the Gellers flirt, we don't have a problem.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey uh, y'know that smell gas has?

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: They put that in.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The gas is odorless, but they add the smell so you know when there's a leak.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Well okay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A lot of other gas smells…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh the humanity.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Meth-methane smells…

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Y'know what umm, actually I, I really, I should go.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh but I-I-I haven't paid you yet!

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Y'know what? That's okay, you guys have ordered so many that this one is on me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Was I talking to her about gas?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: More so than anything else.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I-I-I found it interesting.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, no-no, hey, hey, don't worry about it! In nine years, she and I will be right there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well, I'm gonna clear out some of these boxes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What else do they add smell too?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Hey! Hi! Hey-hey-hey, I'm Rachel! From upstairs? The ones with all the pizza?

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Oh, is there a problem?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. No. Every thing's--they're fine. Great pizza. But it's uh, actually umm my friend Ross. He uh, just gets really nervous when he's flirting.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Oh my God! That was flirting?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know, I know, but uh just, I'm telling you, once, once you get past that part, that where it-it just feels like you wanna die, he's-he's really a good person.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: The guy with the gas?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. I'm-I'm telling you he's really sweet and he's really funny and he's just ugh, got a good heart. And besides, I y'know, I think he really likes you.

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well y'know, we have 7 people and like 10 pizzas, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Caitlin
utterance.content: I just, I thought Joey was there.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Ross? Umm, I just ran into Caitlin in the hallway and-and uh, you must be getting better at this flirting stuff than I thought.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I don't get it, but she wanted me to give you her phone number.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And she just gave you this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, thanks but uh, I don't need you doing me any favors.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I-I-I didn't! I didn't! She thought you were cute.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well that I can believe.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! Is the show still on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Almost over man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look! Oh! Is that the Pope?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why am I looking?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, here I am, here's my big scene!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right back off! I gotta gun! I'm not afraid to use it!

utterance.speaker: Grandma Tribbiani
utterance.content: Oh Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You couldn't have at least changed your shirt.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now, I wanna a suitcase filled with 100,000 dollars. Choo! Choo! Choo! Filled with $100,000 in small bills, and if I don't get it… Choo!! And if I don't get it, I'm gonna shoot this duck!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm comin' out!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And she's supposed to buy this?!

utterance.speaker: Grandma Tribbiani
utterance.content: Joey, bravo!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ground control to Major Tom! Commencing countdown…engines…on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's uh, scenes from next week's show. Next week's!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I am definitely gonna watch that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What about these? These look the same?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Definitely!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not as each other!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, then no.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You ready?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look amazing. I'm the luckiest man in the world.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh, you're about to get a little luckier.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me see the earrings.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, honey, the earrings…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: They look great! Does your boyfriend have the best taste or what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: My boyfriend really does have good taste!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks for picking out the earrings man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hm-mmm.
